(Pika-Hawk gave, right?  If not, forget I said this)


Over the loudspeaker: "The winner of this regular match is...Dragoon!"  A 
cheer came from the spectators, a great deal of them leaving now that the 
fight was over to go watch a more active fight.

Several armed soldiers approached Dragoon.  "You will follow us."  While the 
soldiers spoke with Dragoon, a group of medics approached Pika-Hawk and began 
repairs.
